TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumSTATDATA

Docs.summary: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface enumerates an array of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATDATA> structures.
For more information about the `IEnumSTATDATA` interface, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Clone(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IEnumSTATDATA newEnum) cil managed

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains a reference to the newly created enumerator. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Creates a new enumerator that contains the same enumeration state as the current enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about `IEnumSTATDATA::Clone`, see the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Next (int celt, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATDATA[] rgelt, int[] pceltFetched);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Next(int32 celt, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATDATA[] rgelt, int32[] pceltFetched) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATDATA> references to return in `rgelt`.
When this method returns, contains a reference to the enumerated <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATDATA> references. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
When this parameter returns, contains a reference to the actual number of references enumerated in `rgelt`. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a specified number of items in the enumeration sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about `IEnumSTATDATA::Next`, see the MSDN Library.
